mapper.select: select seq_code AS code, seq_name, Seq_description as description, seq_sort_order as sortOrder, product_form AS seqString, comp_id from sequence where seq_code=#{code};

SELECT fud.status AS category, fud.seq_code, fud.use_id, comp.comp_id, comp.comp_name AS company, est.est_id, NVL(est.est_name, "") AS establishment, dept.dept_id, NVL(dept.dept_name, "") AS department, fud.use_id AS user_id, NVL(u.user_name, "") AS user, NVL(g.grade_name, "") AS grade, NVL(p.position_name, "") AS position from (SELECT * FROM sequence_use_department WHERE seq_code=#{code}) fud LEFT JOIN organization_user AS ou ON fud.status IN ('U') AND fud.use_id=ou.org_user_id LEFT JOIN department AS dept ON (fud.status IN ('D') AND (fud.use_id=dept.dept_id)) OR (fud.status IN ('U') AND (ou.dept_id=dept.dept_id)) LEFT JOIN establishment AS est ON (fud.status IN ('E') AND (fud.use_id=est.est_id)) OR (fud.status IN ('U', 'D') AND (dept.est_id=est.est_id)) LEFT JOIN company AS comp ON (fud.status IN ('C') AND (fud.use_id=comp.comp_id)) OR (fud.status IN ('U', 'D', 'E') AND (est.comp_id=comp.comp_id)) LEFT JOIN user AS u ON ou.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN grade AS g on ou.grade_code=g.grade_code LEFT JOIN position AS p on ou.position_code=p.position_code;
SELECT "F" AS category, fl.form_code AS useId, form_name AS name FROM (SELECT form_code FROM sequence_use_form WHERE seq_code=#{code}) fl LEFT JOIN form ON fl.form_code = form.form_code;
mapper.update: UPDATE sequence SET seq_del_status=1 WHERE seq_code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sequence(comp_id, seq_name, seq_description, seq_sort_order, product_form) VALUES(#{compId}, #{seqName}, #{description}, #{sortOrder}, #{seqString});
INSERT INTO sequence_use_department(status, seq_code, use_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{seqCode}, #{useId});
mapper.delete: delete from sequence_use_department where status=#{category} and seq_code = #{seqCode} and use_id = #{useId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sequence_use_department(status, seq_code, use_id) VALUES(#{category}, #{seqCode}, #{useId});
mapper.delete: delete from sequence_use_form where seq_code = #{seqCode} and form_code = #{formCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sequence_use_form(form_code, seq_code) VALUES(#{formCode}, #{seqCode});
